Posts.EditableText: I am having trouble getting my game to work in the downloaded desktop version, but the online version I started it in is completed corrupted (long story). Is there a way to re-upload the modified aslx file without actually publishing the game?
Posts.HTML: I am having trouble getting my game to work in the downloaded desktop version, but the online version I started it in is completed corrupted (long story). Is there a way to re-upload the modified aslx file without actually publishing the game?

Posts.EditableText: You can upload it as unlisted, or unlist it after uploading it. Then only people with a direct link can access it.
Posts.HTML: You can upload it as unlisted, or unlist it after uploading it. Then only people with a direct link can access it.
